text: Veodalen is a valley in Innlandet, Norway. It has a length of about 30 kilometers, and is located in the municipalities of Lom and Vågå. The river of Veo flows through Veodalen, and the mountain cabin of Glitterheim is located in the valley. ==References== Category:Valleys of Innlandet Category:Vågå Category:Lom, Norway Category:Jotunheimen
title: Veodalen
